resources.string: Displays password entries as QR code; can be used to scan QR codes which can then be added to Keepass2Android.
Scan QR code from other device
Select entry to show as QR code
No host app detected! Please install Keepass2Android from Google Play!
Not enabled as plugin in host app!
Text found on QR code. How do you want to handle this text?
This app is built based on the ZXing library and barcode scanner app (Copyright by the ZXing team, licensed under the Apache 2.0 license).
